participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful, nurturing, and sociable. She enjoys connecting with others and has a passion for teaching.
participant_1.background: i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i love eating out with friends. my favorite singer is taylor swift. i am 24 years old. i'm getting married in the spring.
